name: D3
tagline: Functional aspect of creating a D3 tree layout
body:
The tree layout produces tidy node-link diagrams of trees

**This shows a basix example of how to create a D3 tree layout. And shows visually, the transformations that happens when  the data is modified**. 

* Using the _enter and exit selections_, you can add new nodes to match your data, and remove nodes that are no longer needed.
* D3 does not provide a new graphical representation.Instead, you build directly on standards such as CSS3, HTML5 and SVG
* This does not have a Flashy UI. **This concentrates on only the functional aspects**.

**About D3**
D3(Data-Driven Documents).Helps you bring data to life using HTML, SVG and CSS. 

D3â€™s emphasis on web standards gives you the full capabilities of modern browsers without tying yourself to a proprietary framework, combining powerful visualization components and a data-driven approach to DOM manipulation.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
